name: Space Traffic Control (thenerdpoint60, rahdnus, vjs22334)
description:
Welcome Space Traffic Manager! 

Make sure to not get fired!

CONTROLS:

Draw a path by clicking on friendly ships and then drag to set them a path. 

 When a ship is selected, it's landing zone will flash.

When a ship goes to land ,it will turn green. 

Kill the enemy ships by ramming them with defender.
you can launch the defender using this button:
